name: GiftAssistant
0:
”Alexa, Open Gift Assistant”
”Alexa, Start Gift Assistant”
”Alexa, Launch Gift Assistant”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gift assistant
des:
Find the perfect gift for everyone on your list. Get gift recommendations for your family, friends, colleagues, etc. 

Instructions: 
Invoke the skill by saying, Alexa, Open Gift Assistant

You may ask any of the questions below, to get recommendations. 

For Relation based recommendations, say;

> Gift for {friend/ boss/ brother}

> Can you recommend me a gift for my {friend/ boss/ brother}.

> Recommend me a gift for my {friend/ boss/ brother}.

-----------------------------
For Occassions and Relation based recommendations, say;

> {Birthday} gift for {Sister}

-----------------------------
You may use any of the occassions or relationships below within your utterances:

Occassions:
Birthday, New year, Congratulations, Valentines, Thank you, Valentines day, Wedding, Anniversary

Relationships:
Friend, School friend, Boss, Family friend, Kids, Best buddy, Small kids, Classmate, Neighbor, Office mate, Team leader, Childhood friend, Teenager, Manager, Senior citizens, Teen, Youngster, Colleagues, Cousin, College friend, Casual friend, Mate, Office buddy, Old guys, Old people, Old age people.
-----------------------------

Demo skill developed by Pragmatic Voice.
Website: www.pragmatic-voice.com
